rj.tools.util
Class DecimalNumberDocument

java.lang.Object
  javax.swing.text.AbstractDocument
      javax.swing.text.PlainDocument
          rj.tools.util.DecimalNumberDocument
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.swing.text.Document, java.io.Serializable
public class DecimalNumberDocument
extends javax.swing.text.PlainDocument

DecimalNumberDocument only accepts deciaml characters (0-9). This document is intendet to be used with a JTextField or similia object. private JTextField textFied = new JTextField(new DecimalNumberDocument(), "0", 3);

Version:
__0.98.1__
Author:
Ralph Jocham
